hero.title: Communicating the human
hero.subtitle: We create purpose-driven communication strategies from Patagonia. We are a communication and design studio that transforms brands into agents of change, respecting all sentient beings and the planet.

method.title: The method
method.description: From a need arises analysis, in the analysis appears discovery/understanding, then we define objectives, find strategies, devise solutions, obtain results and leave footprints. Those footprints are what allow us to be recognizable, memorable and differentiate ourselves from the rest, strengthening values through solid, human and planned communication.

step1.title: Analysis
step1.description: Deep research of context and needs.

step2.title: Discovery
step2.description: Key findings to guide the project.

step3.title: Objectives
step3.description: Clear definition of goals and scope.

step4.title: Strategies
step4.description: Tailored action plan and creative routes.

impact.title: Our impact
impact.subtitle: We commit to being a force for good in the world.

team.title: In the team
team.description: We foster a safe, inclusive and equitable work space, where there is no place for discrimination or harassment. We believe in flexibility and remote work as part of a real balance between professional and personal life. We seek for each collaborator's growth to be aligned with their purpose, with fair and transparent remuneration.

community.title: In the community
community.description: We guide other organizations to adopt triple impact practices. We support local suppliers and prioritize those from underrepresented groups. We offer reduced rates and pro bono services to NGOs and vulnerable groups, we reserve the right not to collaborate with clients or suppliers whose activity is incompatible with our values.

planet.title: On the planet
planet.description: We measure our energy and water consumption and our emissions to understand and reduce our impact. We share resources with our team to encourage sustainable practices in their workspaces, such as efficient use of energy and safe disposal of electronic waste. We promote digitization and have a zero waste to landfill commitment, separating our waste for recycling or composting.

consulting.title: Consulting and strategy
consulting.description: We help our clients achieve their goals through defining their target and determining goals, then developing a comprehensive and personalized communication plan for them.

advisory.title: Communication advisory
advisory.description: A personalized space to understand, analyze and find the right strategy according to each objective. We do this through a one-to-one relationship, seeking to understand the current situation and understand the needs.

diagnostic.title: Communication diagnosis
diagnostic.description: We research, evaluate and develop strategies to help our clients understand how they are currently communicating and identify opportunities for improvement.

management.title: Communication management
management.description: We take care of planning and managing the internal and/or external communication of brands, based on solid and practical strategies and tactics.

sustainability.title: Sustainability Consulting
sustainability.description: Every task and every project is carried out with a socio-environmental focus, where we carry out organizational and product carbon footprint inventories, design sustainability strategies, Life Cycle Analysis (LCA), preparation and design of sustainability reports, in-company training, etc.

plantBased.title: Alliance with Plant Based Treaty
plantBased.intro: We are proud to work alongside the Plant Based Treaty, a grassroots global initiative that seeks to put food systems at the center of the debate on the climate crisis.
plantBased.missionText1: The Plant Based Treaty is a direct response to the climate emergency. Its mission is to promote an urgent change towards a fair and plant-based food system, that allows us to live safely within our planetary boundaries and reforest the Earth.
plantBased.missionText2: Following the Paris Agreement model, the treaty is based on three fundamental principles (3Rs):

relinquish.title: Relinquish
relinquish.description: Stop the degradation of ecosystems caused by animal agriculture.

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.description: Redirect policies and subsidies towards a plant-based food system.

restore.title: Restore
restore.description: Reforest and restore key ecosystems damaged by livestock.

contribution.title: Our contribution
contribution.text: We actively support this cause by donating pro bono consulting and strategic management hours to amplify its message, and we donate 2% of our total monthly sales to fund its programs.

impact.title: The Impact
impact.text: This initiative has already gained the support of cultural figures such as Paul McCartney and Dr. Jane Goodall, and has been adopted by 34 cities in 10 countries, including capitals and major urban centers such as Los Angeles, Amsterdam, Edinburgh and Belfast.

donate.title: Make your donation
donate.text: Your support helps us amplify the message and work for a more sustainable future

plantBased.learnMore: Learn more about Plant Based Treaty

sdg.title: Sustainable Development Goals
sdg.subtitle: Our policies and impact actions directly contribute to the United Nations SDG goals, focusing our efforts on:

5.title: Gender Equality
5.description: We contribute to goals 5.1 (eliminate discrimination) and 5.5 (ensure full participation) through our non-discrimination policies and preference for suppliers from underrepresented groups, including women-led businesses.

8.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
8.description: We promote goals 8.5 (full and productive employment with fair pay), 8.6 (employment and training for youth) and 8.7 (eradicate forced labor and child labor) through our equitable remuneration policies, prohibition of child/forced labor and a flexible work environment.

11.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
11.description: We contribute to goal 11.6 (reduce the environmental impact of cities) thanks to our environmental management plan, which includes proper waste management and separation and safe disposal of electronic waste.

12.title: Responsible Production and Consumption
12.description: We work towards goal 12.5 (reduce waste generation) by promoting digitization to minimize paper use and encouraging the circular economy in our operations.

13.title: Climate Action
13.description: We contribute to goals 13.2 (incorporate climate change measures into policies) and 13.3 (improve education and awareness) through measuring and offsetting our carbon footprint and actively educating our clients in sustainable practices.

partners.title: We are part of
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with organizations that share our vision of a more just and sustainable world

animalSave.name: Animal Save Movement
animalSave.description: We align with Animal Save Movement's mission to create a movement of justice, compassion and veganism through public awareness and education, seeking to end animal exploitation and objectification, and actively adopting an anti-speciesist stance against all forms of discrimination and oppression.

cleanCreatives.name: Clean Creatives
cleanCreatives.description: As a studio, we commit to rejecting contracts with the fossil fuel industry. We believe that the creative industry should not use its talent to greenwash the image of corporations that drive the climate crisis.

ati.name: ati (Triple Impact Agencies)
ati.description: The first Latin American community that brings together communication, advertising and marketing agencies with purpose. Founded by done! and Bi, ati. seeks to capitalize creative talent to contribute to solving the most urgent socio-environmental problems and drive the transition to a new social and economic model.

redCreer.name: Red Creer
redCreer.description: We are part of Red Creer, a collaborative network of more than 160 organizations from the public, private and social sectors in Argentina, which seeks to generate socio-economic inclusion opportunities for people who are or were deprived of their liberty, addressing stigma and building a society with greater opportunities for all.

footer.tagline: Purpose-driven communication and design from Argentine Patagonia.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: At Chacal Estudio, we deeply value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data with transparency and responsibility. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you interact with our website and services.

userRights.rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Selected cases that reflect our commitment to purposeful communication and triple impact.
projects.allProjectsSubtitle: Each project is an opportunity to generate positive impact. Discover how design and communication can transform realities.

ecosfera-urbana.title: Urban Ecosphere
ecosfera-urbana.summary: Creative campaign to promote sustainable practices in Latin American cities.
ecosfera-urbana.description: A comprehensive initiative to transform the relationship between citizens and their urban environment through artistic interventions and strategic communication.
ecosfera-urbana.challenge: Emotionally connect inhabitants of large cities with the importance of everyday sustainability, overcoming apathy and cynicism.
ecosfera-urbana.solution: We developed a vibrant visual identity and a friendly tone of voice that celebrates small actions, using urban art as the main channel.
ecosfera-urbana.results: Reach of over 2 million people in 3 countries and a 40% increase in participation in municipal recycling programs.

conexion-aula.title: Classroom Connection
conexion-aula.summary: Educational platform that humanizes digital learning for vulnerable communities.
conexion-aula.description: User experience design for a remote learning platform specifically designed for areas with low connectivity.
conexion-aula.challenge: Create an intuitive and lightweight interface that works on older devices and unstable connections, without sacrificing pedagogical quality.
conexion-aula.solution: We implemented an "offline-first" design with a clean and friendly aesthetic, prioritizing clarity and accessibility over heavy decorative elements.
conexion-aula.results: Adopci√≥n by more than 50 rural schools and an 85% course completion rate.

raices-del-futuro.title: Roots of the Future
raices-del-futuro.summary: Visual identity and storytelling for an organization focused on community reforestation.
raices-del-futuro.description: Complete rebranding for an NGO that seeks to empower local communities through reforestation and soil care.
raices-del-futuro.challenge: The organization was perceived as technical and distant. They needed a brand that inspired belonging and community action.
raices-del-futuro.solution: We created a visual system based on organic shapes and earth colors, accompanied by a narrative that puts the community at the center of the story.
raices-del-futuro.results: 200% increase in local volunteering and international recognition for best practices in environmental communication.

impacto-visual.title: Visual Impact
impacto-visual.summary: Interactive annual report design for human rights NGO.
impacto-visual.description: Transformation of a dense and technical report into an interactive and moving digital experience.
impacto-visual.challenge: Make complex data on human rights violations accessible and understandable without trivializing suffering.
impacto-visual.solution: We used scrollytelling and interactive data visualization to guide the user through the information, balancing hard data with personal stories.
impacto-visual.results: The most read report in the organization's history, with an average dwell time of 8 minutes.

voces-nativas.title: Native Voices
voces-nativas.summary: Podcast platform to preserve endangered indigenous languages.
voces-nativas.description: A living sound archive that celebrates linguistic and cultural diversity through stories told in first person.
voces-nativas.challenge: Preservar oral languages in a modern digital format that is attractive to new generations.
voces-nativas.solution: We designed an immersive auditory experience accompanied by a minimalist visual interface that gives prominence to the voice and soundscape.
voces-nativas.results: Documentation of 12 endangered languages and creation of an active community of young speakers.

energia-limpia.title: Clean Energy
energia-limpia.summary: Rebranding for accessible solar energy startup.
energia-limpia.description: Brand redefinition for a company that seeks to democratize access to solar energy in low-income households.
energia-limpia.challenge: Differentiate in a market saturated with "cold" technology and connect with the real needs of families.
energia-limpia.solution: We built a warm and optimistic brand, focused on well-being and family savings, moving away from the usual technicality of the sector.
energia-limpia.results: Doubling of monthly installations and opening of two new regional branches.
